resources.string: To use this app first either enter text directly or paste a valid url into the text box and then choose the corresponding button. If it is a url select the URL button, and if it is text then select the Text button. Select the button in the top right to share the summary that is created. Select the Settings button on the bottom left to change the background color of the app. Enjoy!
Press the button to change the background color of the app.
